messages.alpha: The {_field_} field may only contain alphabetic characters
messages.alpha_num: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
messages.alpha_dash: The {_field_} field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
messages.alpha_spaces: The {_field_} field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
messages.between: The {_field_} field must be between {min} and {max}
messages.confirmed: The {_field_} field confirmation does not match
messages.digits: The {_field_} field must be numeric and exactly contain {length} digits
messages.dimensions: The {_field_} field must be {width} pixels by {height} pixels
messages.email: The {_field_} field must be a valid email
messages.excluded: The {_field_} field is not a valid value
messages.ext: The {_field_} field is not a valid file
messages.image: The {_field_} field must be an image
messages.integer: The {_field_} field must be an integer
messages.max_value: The {_field_} field must be {max} or less
messages.max: The {_field_} field may not be greater than {length} characters
messages.mimes: The {_field_} field must have a valid file type
messages.min_value: The {_field_} field must be {min} or more
messages.min: The {_field_} field must be at least {length} characters
messages.numeric: The {_field_} field may only contain numeric characters
messages.oneOf: The {_field_} field is not a valid value
messages.size: The {_field_} field size must be less than {size}KB
messages.decimal: The {_field_} field must contain only decimal values

about.hiText: Hi, I'm Andrey â€“ front-end developer from Tomsk.
about.interestedText: I'm interested in it-technologies, especially in front-end and sites layout.
about.studyingText: I'm studied JS, React and Vue at home.

description.css:
I understand the layout well. In my work, I actively use flexbox and grid layout.
Layout is carried out according to the methodology BEM
description.scss:
Actively use mixins, styles-building, 
variables in me work. I can to set up different fonts and icon-fonts.
description.html: Basic knowledge in HTML. I use them every day in my work or training.
description.vue: I beginner in Vue. I understand and use some techniques and hints. Learning Vue right now. In my work, I use  IDE Webstorm. I can do modal windows, custom (my) components, validation (Vee-Validate).
description.bootstrap: Often use this library. Understand clearly.
description.git: In my work in team we use github, and I understand how to create branch, do pull request, resolve merge conflicts and others.
description.nuxt: Understand structure of projects. I know how to create and put components for normal work of all project
description.figma: When I was doing layout sample was done in Figma. I understand how to use it product for done layout.

footer.wantToKnowMoreOrJustChart: Want to know more or just chat?

work.desc: In my works, I have implemented and demonstrated the entire level of accumulated knowledge and skills in programming. Everything I've learned.
work.languagePanel: 1. Library nuxt-i18n is connected and language change is implemented.
work.validation: 2.Installed plugin Vee-Validate, configured validation on input fields, written its own validation rule for check phone number.
work.basicPattern: 3. The project uses basic Vue patterns - loops, conditional rendering of elements, dynamic classes.
work.components: 4. Projects are divided into components for optimal performance.
work.customAndPopup: 5. Custom components have been implemented on projects, modal windows have been made.
work.adaptive: 2. All layout done for all sizes device screen.
work.animation: 3. All effects are fluid, some with animation.
work.mixins: 4. All colors and often types of styles places into mixins.
work.bem: 5. The code is easy to read, because it is made according to the BEM methodology.
